name: Monstrous Neighbour
description:
One of your neighbours is a monster. Kill them before they kill you.

Play a short game (many times) to find out how far you will go when you hear the call to adventure.

Thirty-seven endings. Many deaths. Ten achievements.

  • Monstrous Neighbour 1.3: Made in Twine 2.1.3 (Harlowe 2.0.1).
